__e: He had the same condition as Talan, only he died before it became too severe, in the war.
Oh, how he loved to suffer, He suffered about everything,
She suffers from, or suffered from feelings that she was forgotten.

Broken by the pain inflicted by the weight of the dead body, pulling on the chains attached to her wrists, she was biting her lips to stop herself from screaming and desperately looked down at her lover's spilling blood... I think it should be everyone's problem.
The rest of us were so sleep-deprived we could barely manage to stay sane.
He had sores all over his body.
The truth was... that no matter how bad I felt... I was still very attracted to him.
Thanks to you, it was ailing. Has been for the last three years.
When I was a little kid and my mother bought me a popsicle, watching it melt made me suffer like a dog.
Even after five days, I still had jet lag and was a little tired all the time.
I may have been back in the city, but now I was really Suffern.
